title: we need harsh punishments for intentionally feeding players
body:
I can never have a half decent game without a player deciding to feed due to another player not ganking or wanting the lane, seriously its just stupid and annoying its a waste of time trying to enjoy a match if one player ruins it for everyone. eg *Crypted* he was intentionally feeding because his support was taking kills but not taking his farm (is that wrong ? i dont think so) 

just please read this forums and do something or plan to do something anything will help i cant deal with more players like this, having harsh punishments not technically banning the player but not allowing them but something so they can learn from

replies.body: 48 hour bans wont do a thing. Just send em to bronze 5 or really low MMR.
